backend/main.mo: Defines the ERP backend actor, including authorization mixins and all data types for organizations, CRM, HRMS, ecommerce, and storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests tied to deployment readiness verification for Activity 2 Step 6.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/ACTIVITY_2_DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST: Markdown checklist detailing the full multi-step deployment process and readiness checks, including access control and Stripe configuration.
frontend/ACTIVITY_3_OPTION_1_SPEC_TEMPLA: Specification template for defining requirements, roles, UI changes, and backend needs for Activity 3 Option 1.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount element and script reference for the React application.
frontend/POST_MIGRATION_BUILD_NOTES.md: Developer notes for verifying the post-migration build during Activity 2 Step 5.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup including routing, providers, modals, deployment readiness banner, and page registrations.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Provides CRUD UI for product categories with a dialog form for adding and editing categories.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Shows a table of orders and allows updating order status with color‑coded badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Lists organizations and provides a dialog to create new ones with loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Manages product CRUD with a dialog form supporting pricing, categories, digital flag, and optional image handling.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: Implements contact CRUD with identity-linked ownership and a modal form for editing.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of CRM leads with dialogs, forms, and stage-based display. Integrates API hooks, identity, and UI components to handle lead lifecycle actions.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Handles CRUD operations for sales opportunities using forms and dialogs. Builds and submits opportunity data with stage, value, and probability fields.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays pipeline statistics and lead counts per stage with visual progress bars. Fetches dashboard data and renders a summary and pipeline chart image.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentReadin: Displays an admin-only deployment readiness alert summarizing access control, Stripe setup, and recommendations with navigation to admin settings.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a GitHub link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation bar with authentication controls, admin links, cart access, and organization switching.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Placeholder component showing an upcoming attendance tracking feature. Renders a simple card with icon and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: Provides CRUD management for departments using dialogs and forms. Loads department data and allows adding, editing, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Manages employees with forms for details such as role, department, salary, and status. Supports creating, editing, and deleting employees using API hooks.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Displays pending leave requests with approve and reject actions using query hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder card showing upcoming payroll processing functionality.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder card indicating future employee performance tracking features.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Provides a dropdown to switch between available organizations, showing loading and active selection states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal prompting new users to enter their name and create a profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for entering Stripe credentials and allowed countries when Stripe is not yet configured.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Manages organization wallets, including listing, adding, and deleting wallets with dialogs and API interactions.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays organization wallet balances and recent transactions with loading, error, and no-organization states, using query hooks for data.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a cart context with add, remove, update, and persistence logic for product items.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages active organization state, syncing with localStorage and invalidating related queries on changes.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Tracks wallet connector availability, selection, and connection state with connect and disconnect handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and stored identity management.
Custom hook that syncs a state value to localStorage with JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks including deployment readiness checks using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from its context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Activity3Requirements: Admin-only page for entering and generating Activity 3 build instructions with local draft storage.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing analytics, configuration readiness, and management interfaces.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page handling Stripe or ICP checkout flows and wallet connections.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: Admin-only CRM dashboard displaying statistics and access to CRM management modules.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Admin‑gated HRMS dashboard with tabs for overview and management sections using HR data queries.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders with status, details, and cancellation support, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to return to cart or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart and shows a success message with navigation to orders or storefront.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Product catalog with search, category filtering, loading skeletons, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/WalletOverviewPage.ts: Displays wallet summaries for the active organization with loading and error states.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Type definitions for ERP entities including products, orders, CRM objects, HRMS structures, and supporting enums.
frontend/src/utils/activity3BuildInstruc: Generates Markdown build instructions from an Activity 3 spec and checks if the spec is empty.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Formats identity strings by truncating the middle for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/src/utils/walletErrors.ts: Converts backend wallet-related errors into standardized user-facing messages.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements a wallet connector for Oisy, handling availability, connect, disconnect, and state retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Implements a wallet connector for Plug, including connect flows, identity retrieval, and disconnect handling.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Declares TypeScript ambient types for Plug and Oisy in‑page wallet providers.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors and exposes lookup utilities.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines shared wallet connector interfaces, IDs, and identity types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with extended theming, plugins, colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and a single existing feature definition.
